title: "What are the Quantum Psi techniques and how do they work?"
first_phrase: This text discusses the four-day Quantum Psi course held in Torino, which aims to introduce participants to the techniques of emotional deconstruction to be used in parallel with the Yang approach already taught in the Presence course. The last 200 tokens discuss various techniques, including physical quantum techniques such as light and rotation and catartic techniques with breathing and fascination, as well as communication techniques like empathy and multi-dimensional communication. The text also covers hypnomentalism, regression, and double externalization techniques. The section concludes with a cognitive technique for processing grief and a discussion on time and Quantum Psi.

last_phrase: In conclusion, these exercises and techniques offer various ways to develop one's perceptual and cognitive abilities, as well as to address emotional and psychological issues.
